  physical_appearance: This is a long piece of cloth
 used as a turban. It is gold in colour
 with brocading. The ends of the cloth feature a geometric design made of silver sequins and embroidered thread. The ends are slightly frayed. The ends of the turban cloth is laid out on the right
 while the rest of the length of the fabric is collected on the right.

  subject_terms_1: brocade (textile) embroidery (visual works) turbans cloth

  subject_terms_2: Textile fabrics Brocade Embroidery Turbans

  subject_terms_4: 

  sgcool_label_text: This length of fine brocade
 embellished with embroidery and silver sequins
 is a turban cloth. It would have been used by aristocracy or royalty in Rajasthan

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a long piece of cloth, used as a turban. It is gold in colour, with brocading. The ends of the cloth feature a geometric design made of silver sequins and embroidered thread. The ends are slightly frayed. The ends of the turban cloth is laid out on the right, while the rest of the length of the fabric is collected on the right.
metadata.subject_terms_3: Textile art and design Indian costumes
